summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5632 for the improvement of 28th Avenue West, from West Bertona Street to Tilden Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 74316 as amended by Ordinance No. 74355, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
